code: var positions=[{company:"Flipkart",position:"Summer Intern",link:"https://flipkart.com",daterange:"May 2021 - July 2021",points:["Reduced the potential bad burn incurred by the company during major sale events by enhancing the anomaly detection system","Prepared comprehensive reports to perform real-time analysis of the modifications made to the anomaly detection system"]},{company:"Newzera",position:"Winter Intern",link:"https://newzera.com",daterange:"January 2021 - March 2021",points:["Developed the server-side architecture of Content Management System using GraphQL with Apollo Client.","Developed and designed interactive front-end of various internal applications used by the company using React.js","Tested various softwares to ensure appropriate responsiveness and effectiveness"]},{company:"Helix Tech.",position:"Software Development Intern",link:"https://www.helixtech.co/",daterange:"May 2019 - July 2019",points:["Developed Papercrunch, an android application, currently being used as the primary tutorial application.","Developed RESTful APIs that provide a robust backend for the application using Django REST Framework.","Implemented a playground feature to support interactive learning by providing an IDE on the application."]}];export default positions;
